profile:
Custom Colour Carpets and Rugs

What is Custom Colour Carpets and Rugs all about?  We have been highly trained for performing intricate colour restoration of fine Persian and Oriental Rugs.  We also provide services to repair bleach spots on carpeting.   We have over 18 years of experience cleaning all types of carpet and upholstery.  

You will find interesting ways to add colour to your carpets and rugs.    

YOU WILL SAVE AN AVERAGE OF 65%-75% BY LETTING US DYE YOUR CARPET INSTEAD OF REPLACING IT. SATISFACTION GUARANTEED!

Please view our Services:

​​We provide carpet dyeing services in the Ontario area (Toronto, Barrie, Etobicoke, North York, Newmarket, Richmond Hill, Vaughan, Markham, Scarborough, Ajax, Pickering, Whitby, Kingston, Oshawa, Bolton, Orangeville, Muskoka, Mississauga, Brampton, Milton, Georgetown, Halton Hills, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Stoney Creek, Brantford, Guelph, Kitchener, Cambridge, London, St Thomas, Sarnia, Chatham-Kent, Windsor, etc) for both residential and commercial properties.  We are located in the Niagara Region (Port Colborne, Fort Erie, Welland, Niagara Falls, Niagara-on-the-Lake, Thorold, Lincoln, Jordan, Smithville, Pelham, St. Catharines, Grimsby).  Please scroll down to see the services we offer:

PLEASE CALL US FOR A FREE ON-SITE ESTIMATE

We're social here:
https://www.instagram.com/customcolourcarpets/
https://www.facebook.com/customcolourcarpets
products: Dyes for wool, silk, and nylon carpets & rugs.  Also can dye solution dyed nylon and polypropylene carpets & rugs.
services:
Bleach Spot Repair
Carpet/Rug Colour Change 
Carpet Maintenance using the 'Colorclean' process 
Side Seam Matching 
Colour Restoration 
Tea Wash Dyeing or Over-Dyeing
Stain, Spot or Soil Removal
